title: Sweetness Near Me - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Short Story
author: Bu Zhi Shi Ke Cai   不知是颗菜
description:
Cheng Rou: “Do the questions.”

Wen Lai: “Ah?”

Cheng Rou: “Aren’t you testing for the Chinese Culture University, I will teach you how to do the questions.”

Wen Lai: “But……but I……”

Cheng Ruo gave her a questioning look, “You what?”

Wen Lai bit her lip embarrassingly.

But if you sit next to me, I can’t focus on the questions!>
